name: Blade Ward
description: Until the end of your next turn, you have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from weapon attacks.

name: Shield
castingTime: 1 reaction (when hit or targeted by *magic missile*)
description: +5 AC until the start of your next turn; you take no damage from *magic missile*.

name: Protection from Evil and Good
description: Wards a creature against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead. These creatures have disadvantage to hit the target, and the target can't be charmed, frightened, or possessed by them.

name: Arcane Lock
description: Magically locks a door, window, or object. Requires extra effort or specific means to open.

name: Aid
description: Increase max HP and current HP of up to 3 creatures by 5 (scales with higher levels).

name: Counterspell
castingTime: 1 reaction (when you see a creature casting a spell)
description: Interrupt and cancel a creatureâ€™s spell if it is 3rd level or lower, or roll to cancel higher-level spells.

name: Dispel Magic
description: End one spell effect on a target. Automatically ends spells of 3rd level or lower.
classes: Bard, Cleric, Druid, Paladin, Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Artificer

name: Freedom of Movement
description: The target cannot be paralyzed, restrained, or impeded by magical movement restrictions.

name: Stoneskin
description: Grants resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

name: Wall of Force
description: Create an invisible wall of force that nothing can pass through unless via teleportation or disintegration.

name: Globe of Invulnerability
description: A barrier surrounds you, negating all spells of 5th level or lower that target creatures or objects within the globe.

name: Symbol
description: Inscribe a glyph that activates with an effect such as fear, pain, or sleep when triggered.
damage: Depends on glyph (e.g., 10d10 necrotic for pain)

name: Antimagic Field
description: A field suppresses all magic in its area, including magical effects, items, and spellcasting.

name: Prismatic Wall
description: A wall made of 7 multicolored layers with different magical effects. Each layer must be bypassed separately with specific means.
damage: Varies by layer (acid, fire, poison, etc.)
